summary: REQ-68, REQ-70, and REQ-71 appear implemented via updated roadmap templates, a new ATS Resume Generator card that navigates to a dedicated route, and router/SEO/sitemap updates. REQ-69 (ATS Resume Generator wizard + outputs) is largely present, but the diff evidence is truncated and does not conclusively show the .txt download implementation (and only partially evidences clipboard copy). Several unrelated branding/SEO/UI changes appear in the diff summary but were not requested in this BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide export options for the ATS Resume Generator: (1) copy full resume as plain text to clipboard and (2) download the resume as a .txt file.
missing_requirements.reason: The new tool component shows an import for clipboard copy and includes Download/Copy icons, but the displayed/truncated code does not show the actual implementation of the .txt download (and the copy handler is not visible in the provided truncated portion).

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated unrelated site-wide branding, styling, and layout elements (navbar redesign, footer branding, global CSS/theme changes, logo asset) beyond what was needed to add the new tool card/page and improve roadmap content.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals state not to redesign unrelated homepage sections/tools beyond what is needed; the diff summary indicates changes to navbar/footer/index.css and adding a logo asset.

hallucinated_features.description: Added Google AdSense loader script in the HTML head / additional ad-related changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-68..REQ-71 and outside the scope of roadmap/resume generator additions.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (entry for frontend/index.html mentions Google AdSense loader script)

hallucinated_features.description: Expanded/changed career paths dataset and selector features (200+ paths enrichment, filtering utilities, selector UI enhancements) beyond the specific request to update roadmap template data used by getRoadmapTemplate(...).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-68 specifically asks to update the roadmap template data; the diff summary indicates broader changes to careerPaths.ts and CareerPathSelector.tsx.
